sentence: Because of course they are.” Dr. Mehmet Oz, U.S. Senate candidate: “This picture encompasses everything wrong with the far left, like Stacey Abrams and the mandates harming our children.” Benjamin Weingarten, RealClearInvestigations: “So they have no explanation for why the indefensible masking of children persists while the non-Governor of Georgia—who is more at risk than the kids—gets to breathe freely.” Scott Walker, former Wisconsin governor: “This will go down as one of the dumbest political moves in history.
title: Abrams Slammed For Being Maskless Next To Masked Children: ‘This Photo Is Catastrophic’ For Democrats

sentence: In the Senate, Republicans look to retain an open seat with likely Republican primary candidate David McCormick leading in the polls against Mehmet Oz.
author: Wendell Husebø
title: Poll: Joe Biden’s Approval Rating Is 36 Percent, Impacting Battleground States

sentence: "President Trump appointed me to two terms on the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition," tweeted Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running for Senate in Pennsylvania.
author: Jon Brown
title: Biden demands Dr. Oz, Herschel Walker step down amid Senate runs

sentence: The Biden administration is seeking the formal resignations of TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and former NFL star Herschel Walker from the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition, warning that failure to quit the posts would lead to termination.
author: Abid Rahman
title: Biden Administration Seeks Resignations of Dr. Oz, Herschel Walker From Presidential Council

sentence: Herschel Walker and Mehmet Oz, who are now Republican Senate candidates in Georgia and Pennsylvania, respectively, were appointed in 2018 by President Donald Trump to serve on the council.
author: Donald Judd and Maegan Vazquez
title: Biden requests Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker resign from presidential council or be terminated

sentence: The White House sent Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker letters demanding their resignations from the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition, and informed the U.S. Senate candidates from Pennsylvania and Georgia respectively that if they do not resign by 6 p.m. Wednesday they will be “terminated.” Under the Hatch Act, Oz and Walker are considered special government employees who “may not be candidates in partisan elections” while engaged in official government business.
author: Michael Luciano
title: Joe Biden Just Fired Dr. Oz – Yes, Really

sentence: The Biden administration threatened Wednesday to remove Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker from a federal advisory committee if they didn't resign, setting the stage for a public fight with two high-profile GOP Senate candidates.
author: Zoë Richards
title: White House moves to oust Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from presidential advisory panel

sentence: The doctor he should ask to resign is Dr. Fauci, for a multitude of obvious reasons.pic.twitter.com/fJaVLKVWOC — Dr. Mehmet Oz (@Dr. Mehmet Oz) 1648080535 Oz is running for a U.S. Senate seat in Pennsylvania, while Walker is running for a U.S. Senate seat in Georgia — both men are slated to compete in Republican primaries this May.
author: Alex Nitzberg
title: White House ousts Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker from President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition

sentence: President Joe Biden's administration sent letters to television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and former NFL player Herschel Walker Wednesday, asking them to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition or be terminated by the end of the day.
author: Lauren Frias
title: Biden asked Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from a presidential council or be terminated

sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — The White House has removed Dr. Mehmet Oz — best known as daytime TV’s host of “The Dr. Oz Show” — and former football star Herschel Walker from the President’s Council on Sports, Nutrition and Fitness as both men run for U.S. Senate.
author: The Associated Press
title: Herschel Walker, Dr. Oz removed from Biden’s sports council

sentence: The White House requested Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker, who are now Republican Senate candidates in Pennsylvania and Georgia, respectively, to step down from their positions as the administration forbids federal candidates to be members of presidential boards.
author: Joseph Gobran
title: Dr. Oz And Herschel Walker Asked By White House To Step Down Or Be Fired, Both Were Trump Appointees

sentence: pic.twitter.com/fJaVLKVWOC — Dr. Mehmet Oz (@DrOz) March 24, 2022 Oz also used the video to levy an attack against Dr. Anthony Fauci, a White House medical adviser and the director of the National Insitute for Allergies and Infectious Diseases.
author: Alex Hider
title: Biden asks Dr. Oz, Herschel Walker to resign from presidential fitness council

sentence: Just as President Joe Biden has reportedly asked GOP Senate candidates Herschel Walker and Mehmet Oz to resign their posts on the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition, Biden has announced his intent to appoint their replacements.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: You’re fired! Biden gives Dr. Oz the boot and appoints José Andrés to presidential council

sentence: On Wednesday, the Biden administration notified former football star Herschel Walker and celebrity physician Dr. Mehmet Oz that they could either resign from the council or be fired, according to NBC News.
author: Jack Davis
title: Biden Demands Herschel Walker and Dr. Oz Quit Presidential Advisory Council or Be Ousted

author: Derek Saul
title: Georgia Senate Candidate Herschel Walker Refuses To Resign From Presidential Council

sentence: pic.twitter.com/fJaVLKVWOC — Dr. Mehmet Oz (@DrOz) March 24, 2022 If President Biden wants to politicize health, he will have to fire me.
author: Andi Ortiz
title: Biden Boots Dr. Oz, Herschel Walker From Presidential Council

sentence: On Wednesday, the White House sent letters to Dr Mehmet Oz and former football star Herschel Walker – two Republican Senate candidates in Pennsylvania and Georgia, respectively – asking them to submit their resignations or face termination.
author: Maya Yang
title: White House tells Dr Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from fitness council

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running for the U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania as a Republican, told Newsmax on Thursday that he was asked a day earlier by the White House to resign or face termination from his position on the President's Council on Sports, Fitness, & Nutrition.
author: Luca Cacciatore
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: Removal From WH Fitness Council Politically Motivated

sentence: The White House requested for Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition on Wednesday, or else face termination, according to CNN.
author: STATION GOSSIP
title: White House ousts Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker from President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition

sentence: Herschel Walker echoed the sentiments of Dr. Mehmet Oz this week when he responded to President Joe Biden’s demand that he step down from the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition over Hatch Act violation concerns, stating simply, “I’m not a quitter.”Walker, a Republican candidate for U.S. Senate from Georgia, has had a storied career in sports competing in the NFL and the Olympics representing the United States.
author: Kevin Haggerty
title: Herschel Walker on Biden demanding resignation: ‘I’m not a quitter so you’re gonna have to fire me’

sentence: Walker took to Twitter to respond to the sudden demand: “I’m not a quitter so you are going to have to fire me.” Dr. Mehmet Oz, candidate for the Senate in Pennsylvania, received the same demand, questioning the political intent behind the decision to oust two Republican candidates from the health council.
author: Laura Ramirez
title: Biden orders Herschel Walker to step down from health council – or else

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz wrote President Joe Biden to say he would not resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition despite being ordered to do so.
author: Charlie McCarthy
title: Dr. Oz Refuses to Resign From Fitness Council

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz, the longtime talk show host who's running for a Senate seat in Pennsylvania, said he's been formally fired by the White House from his role as a member of the President's Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition.
author: Newsmax Staff
title: Dr. Oz Formally Fired by Biden White House

sentence: On Sunday, Trump also gave his "total endorsement" of Mehmet Oz — also known as the TV personality "Dr. Oz" — and called the latter "brilliant."
author: Cheryl Teh
title: Republican governor says Trump is backing 'crazy' candidates for the GOP's primary races and is 'going to lose in 2022'

sentence: Trump’s standing has improved in North Carolina, where he has endorsed Rep. Ted Budd for the state’s open Senate seat, and in Pennsylvania, where he endorsed former television host Dr. Mehmet Oz for Senate over the weekend as “the one most able to win the General Election against a Radical Left Democrat looking to do unthinkable harm to our Country.” In Ohio, where Trump has also not weighed in on Republican Gov.
author: Eli Yokley
title: Trump’s Endorsees May Lose Some Primaries, but He’s Still the GOP’s Dominant Force

sentence: — Minority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-Ky.) "The Great Commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a tremendous opportunity to Save America by electing the brilliant and well-known Dr. Mehmet Oz for the United States Senate.
title: Donald Trump endorsed Dr. Mehmet Oz over the weekend in the Pennsylvania Senate race. Mitch McConnell didn't follow suit.

sentence: Trump has endorsed Herschel Walker in his race to unseat Sen. Raphael Warnock, D-Ga., Rep. Ted Budd in his campaign to replace retiring Sen. Richard Burr, R-N.C., and Dr. Mehmet Oz in his close primary race to replace retiring Sen. Pat Toomey, R-Pa. Trump has not yet endorsed a Senate candidate in Ohio, although multiple Republicans seek his support.
author: Timothy Frudd
title: Trump’s approval rating remains strong among Republicans

sentence: GROSS: Pennsylvania's an interesting race, which I just want to refer to briefly here, because Trump decided to endorse Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is a famous TV personality.
author: Terry Gross
title: The midterm elections will show if Trump is still a 'kingmaker'

sentence: —This Week (@ThisWeekABC) April 24, 2022 Christie continued by saying Trump's endorsements landed "all over the place," referencing Trump's Senate endorsements of "Hillbilly Elegy" author JD Vance and TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz, Both endorsements received backlash from Republican party officials.
author: Hannah Getahun
title: Chris Christie says Donald Trump's endorsements are 'emotional decisions' and not 'political analysis'
